or. XI 2,18-20, suggests the use of a house and its rooms. On the place system see (apart from Quintilian, op. cit. XI 2,17-26) Rhetorica ad Herennium III 16-24; Cicero, De oratore II 86,353-88,360. The system does not seem to have influenced Augustine’s views on memory, though it has left traces in the structure and technique of the Confessions: see W.
